name: JourneyMap
desc: Minimap, waypoints, mod integration.

name: MAGE
desc: Configurable graphics enhancements.

name: Client Tweaks
desc: Various client related fixes and tweaks, all in a handy menu.

name: Mouse Tweaks
desc: Add extra mouse gestures for inventories and crafting grids.

name: Thaumic JEI
desc: JEI Integration for Thaumcraft.

name: JEI Bees
desc: JEI Integration for Forestry/Gendustry Bees.

name: Just Enough HarvestCraft (JEHC)
desc: JEI Integration for Pam's HarvestCraft.

name: Just Enough Resources (JER)
desc: JEI Integration that gives drop-rates for mobs, dungeonloot, etc.

name: Neat
desc: Minimal Health an unit frames. Only disable this if using RPG-HUD or you don't like Neat (for whatever reason)

name: Item Scroller
desc: Alternative to MouseTweaks

name: Xaero's Minimap
desc: Lightweight alternative to JourneyMap

name: MineMenu
desc: Radial menu that can be used for command/keyboard shortcuts. Not selected by default because random keybinds cannot be added to radial menu.

name: ItemZoom
desc: Check this if you like to get a closer look at item textures.

name: Light Level Overlay Reloaded
desc: Smol light-level overlay if you aren't using Dynamic Surroundings.

name: Durability Show
desc: Toggle-able item/tool/armor durability HUD

name: Fancy Block Particles
desc: Caution: Resource heavy. Adds some flair to particle effects and animations. Highly configurable, costs fps.

name: Dynamic Surroundings
desc: Caution: Resource heavy. Quite nice, has a lot of configurable features that add immersive sound/visual effects. Includes light-level overlay.

name: Keyboard Wizard
desc: Visual keybind editor.

name: Better Foliage
desc: WARNING: FPS HOG *use at your own risk* - As the name implies, makes the fauna of the world 'better'.

name: RPG-HUD
desc: Highly configurable HUD, has a bit of a learning curve.
